column2: PAPA BEAR, THIS IS BRAVO BLACK ONE. THE CITY IS EMPTY, I REPEAT THE CITY IS EMPTY. ALL RUSSIANS HAVE BAILED. THEY LEFT SOME AMMO AND VEHICLES BEHIND. WAITING FOR FURTHER ORDERS. OVER.
ROGER PAPA BEAR. THERE ARE SOME SATCHEL CHARGES IN AMMO BOX. OVER.
COPY THAT, IT WILL BE OUR PLEASURE. STARTING TO LAY SOME SATCHELS. WE'LL RADIO IN AGAIN WHEN THE RUSSIANS ARRIVE. OVER.
PAPA BEAR. THIS IS BRAVO BLACK ONE. THE CHICKEN IS IN THE POT, I REPEAT THE CHICKEN IS IN THE POT. OVER.
PAPA BEAR THIS IS BRAVO BLACK ONE. ALL RUSKIES ARE MEDIUM RARE. OVER.
BRAVO BLACK ONE, THIS IS PAPA BEAR. RECEIVED, STAND BY. OVER.
DID THE RUSSIANS LEFT ANY SATCHEL CHARGES. OVER.
THERE MUST BE RUSSIAN REINFORCEMENTS COMING SOON. SET THE SATCHELS IN THE CITY AND POSITION YOURSELF FOR GOOD AMBUSH. OVER.
BRAVO BLACK ONE. COOK IT. OVER.
